transcript: - Hey guys, it's Justine, and today we're checking out the Oculus Quest. Now I am so excited about this because I love VR, but I don't like the process to make a VR work, until now. With Oculus Quest, you don't need a PC, you don't need any wires, everything you need is right in the box. The experience of VR is so much fun just to transport yourself into another world. A huge thank you to Oculus for sponsoring this video. I have been looking forward to checking this out since it was first announced. Without further ado, let's unbox, check it out and then, I'm going to be going to E3 to be playing a demo of the 360 Beat Saber game. This is what allows you to transport your hands into the game. That makes such a huge difference being able to actually see your hands, because it makes you feel like you're so much more in the environment. I love that it also has this feature called The Guardian. So that'll allow you to not run into things when you're inside of the world. Oculus inside tracking system is right here. So these are ultra-wide angle sensors. It provides room scale tracking without external sensors. It's like we've got a charging brick and this is a little extender, if you have glasses, this will allow you to wear glasses. Hmm, this is a longer USB-C cable.
